testcase.name: test_quality_status_basic

failure.message:
assert False + where False = <function OutputValidator.validate_status_output at 0x104715a80>("#x1F4CA Quality Tracking Status\n
╭─────────────────────────── #x1F4C8 Overall Statistics ────────────────────────────╮
│ Tracked Servers: 3 │
│ With Quality Data: 3 │
│ Total Install Attempts: 22 │
│ Overall Success Rate: 68.2% │
╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
\nQuality Distribution:
╭─── Good ────╮ ╭─── Fair ────╮ ╭─── Poor ────╮
│ ✅ 1 │ │ ⚠️ 1 │ │ ❗ 1 │
│ servers\n(… │ │ servers\n(… │ │ servers\n(… │
╰─────────────╯ ╰─────────────╯ ╰─────────────╯
\n#x1F4A1 Use 'mcp-manager quality rankings' to see detailed server rankings
") + where <function OutputValidator.validate_status_output at 0x104715a80> = OutputValidator.validate_status_output
